manualPage.mainTitle: New here? Here's how to use our service step by step
manualPage.description: This page is designed to help first-time visitors understand the flow of how to use the service. Through a diagram layout, you can visually follow each step and eliminate confusion by reading the explanations. A tutorial machine is also provided so you can try it yourself comfortably.

learning.title: What you can learn from this page
learning.item1: Visually understand the entire process of using the hacking lab.
learning.item2: Try running the tutorial machine to experience the full process in action.
learning.item3: Click a box below to view a detailed explanation of each sidebar menu item.

manualPage.tryTutorial: Now try the tutorial to learn how to play with a machine.

connect.title: Connect
connect.description:
Connect using OpenVPN.
Download your VPN configuration and connect from your environment.

spawn.title: Spawn Machine
spawn.description: Create a machine and start hacking.

hints.title: Hints
hints.description: If you need a hint, press the button.

0.title: How to Play
0.description: Learn about Hack This Out, its rules, and game modes. For more details, check out the YouTube video.

1.title: LeaderBoard
1.description: You can view all user rankings based on score and experience.

2.title: Contests
2.description: A timed competition mode where you hack machines to earn points.

3.title: Machines
3.description: A page where you can freely choose and play various hacking machines.
